# [Interview #971: AMOL Signing Report - Terez, Entry #19](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=971#19)

#### Terez

Were the Aes Sedai at the Silver Swan still there when Caemlyn was attacked?

#### Brandon Sanderson

I.....don't....know.

#### Terez

Don't know. Okay.
